extension.description: Some of popular Thai TV channels. Some of the channels in this addon may require a 16mbis or higher connection as they are high speed streams in their country of origin and may buffer from time to time or just not play if you have slower internet speeds. This add-on is not for sale and provided to TVaddons.ag ONLY if you got this from somewhere else tell me on www.tvaddons.ag
extension.disclaimer: This live TV content can change at anytime and does change, as we do not run the content server(s) for this addon
